categories.name: 00 - README & Index
categories.description: A map of the data room contents and contact details for questions.

categories.name: 01 - Company Overview
categories.description: High-level documents that explain what the company does and why it's a compelling investment.

categories.name: 02 - Corporate & Cap Table
categories.description: Core legal documents defining the company structure, ownership, and stock plans.

categories.name: 03 - Prior Financings & Board
categories.description: Agreements from previous funding rounds and records of board decisions.

categories.name: 04 - Financials
categories.description: Historical and projected financial statements to assess business health and realism of forecasts.

categories.name: 05 - Key Metrics & KPIs
categories.description: Data showing revenue efficiency, customer retention, and business performance.

categories.name: 06 - Product & Technology
categories.description: Information on the technology stack, product roadmap, and security posture.

categories.name: 07 - Intellectual Property
categories.description: Documents proving ownership of intellectual property.

categories.name: 08 - Customers & Revenue
categories.description: Evidence of current and future revenue, including contracts and sales pipeline.

categories.name: 09 - Go-to-Market
categories.description: Strategy and materials related to sales, marketing, and customer acquisition.

categories.name: 10 - Human Resources
categories.description: Information about the team, organizational structure, and hiring plans.

categories.name: 11 - Legal & Compliance
categories.description: Contracts, insurance, and compliance documents to identify hidden risks.

categories.name: 12 - Operations & Policies
categories.description: Internal plans and policies for data security, disaster recovery, and operations.

categories.name: 13 - Investor Communications
categories.description: Past investor updates and board decks demonstrating management transparency.

categories.name: 14 - Use of Funds & Milestones
categories.description: Plans detailing how the raised capital will be allocated to achieve key milestones.

categories.name: 15 - Reference Materials
categories.description: Third-party validation including press, analyst notes, and customer references.

variables.name: date
variables.description: The date of the document in YYYY-MM-DD format.

variables.name: company_name
variables.description: The legal name of your company.

variables.name: doc_type
variables.description: The specific type of the document (e.g., PitchDeck, PnL, CapTable, MSA).

variables.name: version
variables.description: A version number or identifier (e.g., v1, v2.1, final).

variables.name: agreement_type
variables.description: The type of legal agreement (e.g., NDA, SAFE, Note).

variables.name: employee_name
variables.description: The full name of an employee or contractor.

variables.name: report_period
variables.description: The reporting period for a financial document or metric (e.g., Q2-2025).
